title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a RACING SESSION
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACING SESSION" "Grand Prix" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Grand Prix | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Grand Prix | string |
  | start_date |  | string |
  | start_time |  | string |
  | duration |  | number |
  | duration_unit |  | string |
  | distance |  | number |
  | distance_unit |  | string |
